meanings.definition: A three-wheeled vehicle powered by human pedaling, typically used for transporting passengers.
meanings.sent1: Tourists in the city enjoy riding pedicabs to explore the sights.
meanings.sent2: The pedicabs lined up outside the train station were ready to take passengers.
meanings.sent3: The pedicabs raced each other down the street, causing laughter among onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The pedicabs moved through traffic like colorful beetles on the road.
meanings.sent5: The pedicabs weaved through the crowded streets, offering a unique way to see the city.
